name: ARMatteGenerator
desc: An object that creates matte textures you use to occlude your app's virtual content with people, that ARKit recognizes in the camera feed.

items.name: func generateMatte(from: ARFrame, commandBuffer: MTLCommandBuffer) -> MTLTexture
items.desc: Generates alpha matte at either full resolution or half the resolution of the captured image.

items.name: func generateDilatedDepth(from: ARFrame, commandBuffer: MTLCommandBuffer) -> MTLTexture
items.desc: Generates dilated depth at the resolution of the segmentation stencil.

items.name: enum ARMatteGenerator.Resolution
items.desc: A resolution for a matte texture.
